GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
coresight: Clear the connection field properly

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 847b9273dd61567fb77617eabc5fa002594db062, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 37ea1ffddffa63c920ce826786fe610c78f57842. For more details please see the references link.
